definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: dung (NH [[חרא]]([[י]]-), id.; Aram. h.anho0 id.; Mand. [[חרא]] (on this and cogn. lang. in gen. v. No:M 56); Ar. xufo;un id., whence vb. xcariy’a of act, and n. max.ra0’ah;un of place; Amh. h.r4: (Di:Lex. Aeth. 88))—pl. sf. [[חַרְאֵיהֶם]] Is 36:12 Kt (Qr [[חוֹאָתָם]]); ‖ 2Ki 18:27 has [[חֲרִיהֶם]] (v. sg. [[חרי]] 2Ki 6:25; Qr as above); [[חֲרִי יוֹנִים]] dove's dung 2Ki 6:25 Kt (Qr [[דִּבִיוֹנִים]]); v., further, Gei:Urschrift, 409.
